titleStmt.title: Certain passages which happened at Newport, in the Isle of Wight, Novemb. 29. 1648. relating to King Charles I. Written by Mr. Edward Cooke, of Highnam in Gloucestershire, sometime colonel of a regiment under Oliver Cromwell
titleStmt.author: Cooke, Edward, d. 1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Chiswell, at the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Half-title reads: Passages at Newport, in the Isle of Wight.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library; Newberry Library.
